name: [CS3113]Exercise 3: Walking Sim
description:
The goal of this walking sim is to collect coins without hitting the cubes marked with excalmatory mark. When the player hits a coin, the score goes up one. Then the player hits cube, the remaining time reduces by five seconds. When the time runs out, the game would restart.

The game was built using the 3D game starter template, so the player would move with W/A/S/D(up/left/down/right) keys and jump with escape key. The player can go up the stairs and plane. Something can be improve is to make the bumper cube be a trigger as well to restart the game.
